entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -0.4°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
